DescriptionData.Title: AJs Retro Over The Knee Tube Socks
DescriptionData.Description:
Retro over the knee high tube socks are stylish and fun as well as functional. They're great for teams, dance groups, skaters, cheerleaders or any group that wants a graphic and bold look for their uniform.
These socks have stripes at the top. They are 29 inches long, and made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon and 6% elastic. They are very stretchy, but hold their shape once pulled on.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Over the knee tube socks with three stripes at the top
29 inches in length when unstretched
Made from 86% acrylic, 8% nylon, and 6% elastic
Fits shoe sizes 5 and up (sock sizes 11-13)
May not come up as far up on large legs
